title: What is an intelligent Electric Skateboard? Airwheel Creates a New Story
text: What is an intelligent Electric Skateboard? Airwheel Creates a New Story Skateboard is not a strange word in new era, while for the senior citizens which is still a new concept. A skateboard is a type of sports equipment used primarily for the activity of skateboarding. United States, 23 October 2015 -- Motorized skateboard is not a strange word in new era, while for the senior citizens which is still a new concept. A skateboard is a type of sports equipment used primarily for the activity of skateboarding. It usually consists of a specially designed board combined with a polyurethane coating used for making slide smoother with stronger durability. Then, what is an electric skateboard? Many customers or even Airwheel fans are also curious about the answer. In terms of the operation of skateboard, many experiencedveterans are quite familiar with that. A skateboard can be used by simply standing on the deck while on a downward slope and allowing gravity to propel the board and rider. A skater feels typically more comfortable by pushing with their back foot; choosing to push with the front foot is commonly referred to as riding "mongo". Today, an electric skateboard called Airwheel M3has appeared. There doesn’t require the propelling of the skateboard by means of the feet any longer, instead, an electric motor propels the board, powered by the electric battery. Particularly, M3 adopts a double battery design, dedicating to providing diploid battery performance and protection. Moreover, the front and rear wheels of M3 have been equipped with TPU material damper mass to be ridden more smoothly. Even a single module has problem, the whole system can work normally and efficiently, because they are working independently.Historically, the skateboard has conformed both to development of contemporary trend and to different requirements from riders, who are required certain functionality from the board. As a result of that, skating always scares some new green hands. However, the market target of M3 has nothing to do with age or experience. It is the flame of the customer’s heart. Now, it is the right time to try this fresh phenomenon andenjoy surfing on land freely, anywhere and anytime. Get more infromations from Airwheel Official Site ! # # #
